data.name: Anthropocene Epoch
data.detailed_description:
Years ago an intelligence agency sent a Satellite into space coded with a frequency that could be received and sent back to Earth in hopes
to contact alien life. Another few years later a transmission was sent back and was located just outside the solar system, not knowing what
they contacted was hostile and ready to destroy human kind.................Maybe they shouldn't have sent that satellite at all.

Anthropocene Epoch is an alien shooter based in the Sonoma Region which is a semi open concept in a few levels to explore and find items on
your way, it is a mission based game with with 14 levels as well as secret missions. Your Mission is to escape earth by hi jacking one of the
mantis ships and and reuniting with the rest of the human race. This includes helping a few other's on your way.

Game Features include

- 14 levels including secret mission and a supply level
- Atmospheric level design
- Custom Soundtracks for each level
- Open area levels
- Custom Guns as well as hidden ones
- Custom huds

I will be updating this game Frequently, and to make this the best experience as possible thank you I hope you enjoy.

data.short_description: A dark atmospheric scifi First Person Shooter. Encounter characters including Jade An A.I implanted in your head, do missions to help others and get you off Earth before the Mantis destroy it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 8 - DirectX 11
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD Graphics 4 GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything Under Minimum Requirments may not work correctly

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains combat with weapons and blood
